001package com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.calculator;
002
003import com.google.common.base.Preconditions;
004import com.google.common.collect.ImmutableList;
005import com.google.common.collect.ImmutableSet;
006import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.models.InsulinUnit;
007import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.shared.L;
008
009import org.apache.commons.lang3.tuple.Pair;
010
011import java.util.ArrayList;
012import java.util.Arrays;
013import java.util.HashSet;
014import java.util.List;
015import java.util.Set;
016import java.util.stream.Collectors;
017
018/**
019 * Contains logic for deciding an estimated bolus amount given inputs and current pump/CGM status.
020 */
021public class BolusCalculator {
022    private static final String TAG = "BolusCalculator";
023
024    // input fields
025    private final BolusParameters userInputParameters;
026    private final BolusCalcDataSnapshot dataSnapshot;
027    private final BolusCalcLastBG lastBG;
028
029    BolusCalculator(BolusParameters userInputParameters, BolusCalcDataSnapshot dataSnapshot, BolusCalcLastBG lastBG) {
030        this.userInputParameters = userInputParameters;
031        this.dataSnapshot = dataSnapshot;
032        this.lastBG = lastBG;
033    }
034
035    /**
036     * @return the {@link BolusCalcComponent} representing insulin for carbs
037     */
038    public BolusCalcComponent getAddedFromCarbs() {
039        double addedFromCarbs = 0;
040        List<BolusCalcCondition> conditions = new ArrayList<>();
041
042        if (dataSnapshot == null) {
043            return zeroWithCondition(new BolusCalcCondition.WaitingOnPrecondition("carb ratio from data snapshot"));
044        }
045
046        if (userInputParameters.carbsGrams == null) {
047            return zeroWithCondition(new BolusCalcCondition.NonActionDecision("not adding units for carbs", "no carbs provided"));
048        }
049
050        double ratio = InsulinUnit.from1000To1(dataSnapshot.carbRatio);
051        if (ratio > 0) {
052            addedFromCarbs = userInputParameters.carbsGrams / ratio;
053        } else {
054            conditions.add(new BolusCalcCondition.FailedSanityCheck("raw carb ratio is invalid: " + dataSnapshot.carbRatio));
055        }
056
057        return new BolusCalcComponent(BolusCalcUnits.doublePrecision(addedFromCarbs), conditions);
058    }
059
060    /**
061     * @return the {@link BolusCalcComponent} representing insulin for the current BG correction
062     */
063    public BolusCalcComponent getAddedFromGlucose() {
064        double addedFromBG = 0;
065
066        if (dataSnapshot == null) {
067            return zeroWithCondition(new BolusCalcCondition.WaitingOnPrecondition("data snapshot"));
068        }
069
070        if (lastBG == null) {
071            return zeroWithCondition(new BolusCalcCondition.WaitingOnPrecondition("last BG"));
072        }
073
074        Integer lastBGValue = null;
075        List<BolusCalcCondition> conditions = new ArrayList<>();
076        if (userInputParameters.glucoseMgdl != null) {
077            lastBGValue = userInputParameters.glucoseMgdl;
078            conditions.add(new BolusCalcCondition.DataDecision("using BG user input"));
079        } else {
080            Pair<Integer, List<BolusCalcCondition>> lastBG = this.lastBG.determineLastBG();
081            conditions = new ArrayList<>(lastBG.getRight());
082
083            if (lastBG.getLeft() == null) {
084                conditions.add(new BolusCalcCondition.NonActionDecision("not adding units for BG", "no BG provided"));
085                return new BolusCalcComponent(0.0, conditions);
086            }
087            lastBGValue = lastBG.getLeft();
088        }
089
090        if (dataSnapshot.targetBg < 40 || dataSnapshot.targetBg > 400) {
091            conditions.add(new BolusCalcCondition.FailedSanityCheck("target BG is out of range or empty in pump profile"));
092            return new BolusCalcComponent(0.0, conditions);
093        }
094
095        if (dataSnapshot.isf <= 0) {
096            conditions.add(new BolusCalcCondition.FailedSanityCheck("no Insulin Sensitivity Factor present in pump profile"));
097            return new BolusCalcComponent(0.0, conditions);
098        }
099
100        int bgDiff = lastBGValue - dataSnapshot.targetBg;
101        addedFromBG = (1.0 * bgDiff) / dataSnapshot.isf;
102
103        return new BolusCalcComponent(BolusCalcUnits.doublePrecision(addedFromBG), conditions);
104    }
105
106    /**
107     * @return the {@link BolusCalcComponent} representing insulin for the current IOB correction
108     */
109    public BolusCalcComponent getAddedFromIOB() {
110        double addedFromIOB = 0;
111        List<BolusCalcCondition> conditions = new ArrayList<>();
112
113        if (dataSnapshot == null) {
114            return zeroWithCondition(new BolusCalcCondition.WaitingOnPrecondition("data snapshot"));
115        }
116
117        if (dataSnapshot.iob > 0) {
118            addedFromIOB = -1 * dataSnapshot.iob;
119        }
120
121        return new BolusCalcComponent(BolusCalcUnits.doublePrecision(addedFromIOB), conditions);
122    }
123
124    /**
125     * @return a {@link BolusCalcDecision} including the total generated insulin amount, the amounts
126     * for the individual {@link BolusCalcComponent}s, and the conditions which resulted in this calculation.
127     */
128    public BolusCalcDecision parse(BolusCalcCondition ...ignoredConditions) {
129        if (userInputParameters.units != null) {
130            return new BolusCalcDecision(
131                    BolusCalcUnits.fromUser(userInputParameters.units),
132                    ImmutableSet.of(new BolusCalcCondition.DataDecision("using user-provided insulin amount")));
133        }
134
135        Set<BolusCalcCondition> ignored = Arrays.stream(ignoredConditions).collect(Collectors.toSet());
136
137        Set<BolusCalcCondition> conditions = new HashSet<>();
138
139        BolusCalcComponent addedFromCarbs = getAddedFromCarbs();
140        BolusCalcComponent addedFromBG = getAddedFromGlucose();
141        BolusCalcComponent addedFromIOB = getAddedFromIOB();
142
143
144        L.d(TAG, "addedFromCarbs: " + addedFromCarbs);
145        L.d(TAG, "addedFromBG: " + addedFromBG);
146        L.d(TAG, "addedFromIOB: " + addedFromIOB);
147
148        double total = addedFromCarbs.getUnits();
149
150        // above or at target
151        if (addedFromBG.getUnits() >= 0) {
152            // iob is higher than correction, so don't add either (carbs + max(0, bg + iob))
153            if (addedFromBG.getUnits() + addedFromIOB.getUnits() < 0) {
154                conditions.add(BolusCalcCondition.NO_POSITIVE_BG_CORRECTION);
155            } else if (addedFromBG.getUnits() + addedFromIOB.getUnits() == 0) {
156                // do nothing
157            } else {
158                // correction + iob adds a positive delta to the insulin
159                if (shouldApply(ignored, conditions, BolusCalcCondition.POSITIVE_BG_CORRECTION)) {
160                    total += addedFromBG.getUnits() + addedFromIOB.getUnits();
161                }
162            }
163        } else { // below target
164            if (addedFromBG.getUnits() + addedFromIOB.getUnits() == 0) {
165                // do nothing
166            } else if (total + addedFromBG.getUnits() + addedFromIOB.getUnits() > 0) { // correction + iob is less than the carb amount
167                if (shouldApply(ignored, conditions, BolusCalcCondition.NEGATIVE_BG_CORRECTION)) {
168                    total += addedFromBG.getUnits() + addedFromIOB.getUnits();
169                }
170            } else { // correction + iob takes the insulin amount negative
171                if (addedFromCarbs.getUnits() == 0) {
172                    // zero carbs, so don't apply condition
173                    total = 0.0;
174                } else if (shouldApply(ignored, conditions, BolusCalcCondition.SET_ZERO_INSULIN)) {
175                    total = 0.0;
176                }
177            }
178        }
179
180        conditions.addAll(addedFromCarbs.getConditions());
181        conditions.addAll(addedFromBG.getConditions());
182        conditions.addAll(addedFromIOB.getConditions());
183
184        BolusCalcUnits bolusCalcUnits = new BolusCalcUnits(total, addedFromCarbs.getUnits(), addedFromBG.getUnits(), addedFromIOB.getUnits(), 0);
185
186        L.d(TAG, "bolusCalculator: " + bolusCalcUnits + ", " + conditions);
187        Preconditions.checkState(bolusCalcUnits.getTotal() >= 0);
188
189        // If there are any FailedPreconditions, then return 0 units regardless
190        for (BolusCalcCondition condition : conditions) {
191            if (condition instanceof BolusCalcCondition.FailedSanityCheck) {
192                return new BolusCalcDecision(BolusCalcUnits.fromUser(0), conditions);
193            }
194        }
195
196        return new BolusCalcDecision(bolusCalcUnits, conditions);
197    }
198
199    private boolean shouldApply(Set<BolusCalcCondition> ignored, Set<BolusCalcCondition> conditions, BolusCalcCondition condition) {
200        if (ignored.contains(condition)) {
201            conditions.add(new BolusCalcCondition.IgnoredDecision(condition));
202            return false;
203        } else {
204            conditions.add(condition);
205            return true;
206        }
207    }
208
209    /**
210     * @return the {@link BolusCalcUnits} representing the total estimated amount of insulin and the
211     * components which resulted in this estimation
212     */
213    public BolusCalcUnits getUnits() {
214        return parse().getUnits();
215    }
216
217    /**
218     * @return a set of {@link BolusCalcCondition}s which contain human-readable descriptions of
219     * how and why this estimate was made
220     */
221    public Set<BolusCalcCondition> getConditions() {
222        return parse().getConditions();
223    }
224
225    /**
226     * @return true if the user inputted a manual insulin amount, and that is being used instead of
227     * the suggested amount from the bolus calculation
228     */
229    public boolean isOverriddenByUser() {
230        return userInputParameters.units != null;
231    }
232
233    private static BolusCalcComponent zeroWithCondition(BolusCalcCondition one, BolusCalcCondition... more) {
234        return new BolusCalcComponent(0.0, ImmutableList.<BolusCalcCondition>builder().add(one).addAll(Arrays.asList(more)).build());
235    }
236}
